name: 2D Shooter (Raghav Suriyashekar)
description:
2D Shooter game.

Michigan state University

Modifications made:

1 level with spawner script that spawns chaser enemies.

1 level that you have to hide from waves of shooter bots and evade chaser bots.

Volume slider to control volume in game.

total of 5 levels and 1 main menu
